name: eupthf1o

body: |- wi(wbr(c0, cfv(ceupth, c1), c2), wf1o(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), cdm(c3)))

comment: The ` F ` function in an Eulerian path is a bijection from a half-open range of nonnegative integers to the set of edges. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Mar-2015.) (Revised by AV, 18-Feb-2021.)
